website_summaries.verdict: This float island works well for river rafting, holding 4 adults sturdy through rough waters.
pros: 4 backrests make it very comfortable for an all day float
Includes 2 built-in coolers and 4 cup holders
Allows your family to stay together on a float trip
Includes a rope around the outside of the float island
cons: While this will work well with 4 people, there isn't really extra seating for more people

customer_reviews.title: Great float for the lake!
customer_reviews.text: Totally loved this! Took it to Lake Powell for 7 days and all the adults and kids had a blast with it. Very well made, durable, liked the coolers and storage is a bonus! Would buy again and it was an awesome price :)
customer_reviews.author: Krissi Roberts

customer_reviews.title: this thing was great! Well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a weekend lake trip w/friends. Thought it was inexpensive enough that if it only lasted the weekend it was ok, but, this thing was great! Well made, more durable & more fun than expected
customer_reviews.author: Randy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Let's just say, I almost DIED because of this raft. It deflated in the water during a float. Left me stranded and only lasted 45 minutes. It was super easy to blow up, had to pull to the side 3 or 4 times to re-inflate it during the float. Then it just wouldnt stop leaking. I would NOT recommend this for anything. Not floating on the lake, not floating on the river, not floating in a pool. Hell...not even on dry land. Worst 60.00 I've ever spent
customer_reviews.author: Christina Pennington

customer_reviews.title: It does pop even if it says it doesn’t
customer_reviews.text: This float looks so cool so I had to buy it. I took it out to go on the river and it took 20+ minutes just to inflate with a pump. The pump got overheated so we had to pause and wait. It was a great time for the hour it was inflated. We came across a small branch and it popped the float so fast that we all were floating on the seats because that part didn’t pop. It was a pretty funny experience but I don’t recommend this float if you’re trying to go down a river!
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Krueger

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION: Wont last long even if your super careful with it.
customer_reviews.text: So this party pad is pretty cool, holds 4 peeps and all the drinks you want. Beware, mine didn't last long as it seems to puncture easily. Also, once out of the box there is really no good way to store it, even after deflating it. The thing is big and kinda heavy. After just a few uses, it found its way into the recycle bin. If it was a little more durable, Id give it a much higher rating, but its not so my suggestion is find one made with better materials. Theres a reason it was only $85.00.
customer_reviews.author: Spanky Jay

customer_reviews.title: Best Float Investment Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! We are floating down the river right now and, I have to say, I have never had a better experience floating down a river. There is so much room for 4 people and anything we would need for 2-4 hours floating. The coolers hold at leat 12 beers and a bag of ice each. The compartments for your extra stuff are fantastic! There is plenty of leg room and you sit in the water and can have your feet in the water just enough to be comfortable. This is a must have—earns its value on the first run.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda D.

customer_reviews.title: Hole Hole Hole!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible Float. It took 30 minutes to blow up and had a hole in it. I got the orange and blue one. I asked to get it replaced and it was “out of stock” and all they could do was a refund. If I was to buy it again it raised 10 dollars in price I originally paid 66.00 total. really annoyed was hoping this was good and would work for the lake. read recent reviews save your time!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Raft of Disssatifaction
customer_reviews.text: First off, I inflated the raft and five minutes later it started to deflate! Then I check and I see were the deflation was coming from. As I hear a hissing sound I finally see two holes in the raft that were brown and that's definitely a manufacturer error. The box didn't come damage but the raft did! Pretty disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Asre

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the river to float. This is not ment for the river. The plastic on it is not durable enough to handle the rocks. We found a swimming hole and it worked great for that. It is only ment for large bodies for water, like lakes and oceans. Do not take to river and expect to float with it. The plastice could be a little thicker it would make it better.
customer_reviews.author: Tmk

customer_reviews.title: No detail overlooked - excellent buy.
customer_reviews.text: This raft is amazing - no detail has been overlooked. Comfortable seats, great stability, two coolers that are deep enough for food and drinks, non-cooler storage for phone/dry goods, cup holder that grip drinks perfectly so they don't spill when getting in and out. I bought this for a lake trip and basically lived in it for 3 days with some family - it worked well with all the seats full or with just two people. I will use this again and would highly recommend it! I also bought paddles and an electronic pump to fill it up easily. This raft is worth twice the price, so it is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian chica

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: What a great raft for the money! Very sturdy as you can see many boys can climb over it and it has withstood their activities all summer! The adults like to sit and hang out and float around.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Fun & Punctureproof
customer_reviews.text: Great float for the back bays of New Jersey. And...guess what, it was low tide and when we were puting the float in from the dock, it got stuck on a rusty nail, but interestingly, the black part of the float was so strong that there was no hole! I bought a drifting sock to slow us down when we float along with the tide, as well as 2 paddles to steer us away from docks and boats...FUN!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy_wuzy

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for tubing. We literally used it 3-4 times. The last time we went down the river we hit rock and it deflated. Luckily we were able to get to side to get out of the river, but my youngest freaked out at the fast deflation. There was no saving this tube since we had to walk back to our vehicle. I did love that our whole family could fit on one tube and the drink spots and extra spots for ice or what not. But next summer I’ll be buying a 2 person instead of a 4 person. I wish it lasted longer than only 4 uses, especially after spending so much money.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Quality floating party raft.
customer_reviews.text: Great size and seems to be good quality. Had a 4th of July party with a dozen 12-15 y/o kids who were on and off it all day long. Has held up well. Was tricky to air up the pillows without losing air since they aren’t 1 way valves nor were the coolers as I recall. I’d buy another one though if I needed 2. Wouldn’t be as well for 4 adults but 4 kids were great.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Party like there's no manana!
customer_reviews.text: Want to have the best day ever? Buy this float and call up three of your fun friends. Have a boat? Grab a rope and have them tow you and your three fun friends around the lake. Have an ocean? Bring a small anchor and enjoy the salty waves. Anything is possible and this raft is life changing. BUY IT! 4 cup holders, comfy mesh seating inside each raft so your butt can enjoy the water, not one but TWO built in coolers and a fun pool in the middle to play footsies with your new besties. Blows up and deflates with a electric air pump in 10 mins tops!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A dud.
customer_reviews.text: On our first outing, this started to noticeably deflate within an hour. By 3 hours on the river, we were approximately at 2/3 the capacity we had been before. No stability in the float! Extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: About 2 days after I received it, I had it inflated. Two adult women used it the first day & 4 the next, floating in a pool (no river or lake). I went to place it in the pool for day 3 & noticed air was leaking. Finally found where one of the seams had come apart. Like I said, we enjoyed it while it lasted
customer_reviews.author: marsha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome raft!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and very much enjoyed. Coolers are more like places to keep located, but insulation is minimal (OK at this price point). Cup holders are tough slanted unless you have 4 people onboard, but OK problem to deal with. I was surprised at the durability of this raft. No leaks or punctures and we were not easy on it between kids and drinking adults. Foot area is a little tight with 4 on, but we made it work and would definitely recommend for a river, lake or even pool excursion.
customer_reviews.author: Vic Ameye

customer_reviews.title: Well, it saved us from a Colorado Black Bear.
customer_reviews.text: Starting off, only got one use cause the puncture resistant design punctured. Guess we'll try 'er hand at some sledding this winter. Pros: Value priced, eye-catching, mild-rapid compatible, Bear deterrent (had a black bear swim across the river right in front of us.) Cons: cheap feeling material, right out the box we had seam tearing, one time use for us since the day ended with a puncture, it's pretty short-kinda thought you'd be taller sorta thing. Overall, I feel like I got catfished. ⭐️⭐️ Perfect for the college students that only need that one or two uses. La Familiãs, just go Intex or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: HEATHEN

customer_reviews.title: this was a great raft. It has a removable quick-inflate port
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this was a great raft. It has a removable quick-inflate port, room for 4 people comfortably, plenty of locations to tie down to, cup holders, and storage for belongings. However, the unit I bought had a slow leak that became apparent after about 3 hours. Even after submerging the raft in water, I still couldn't identify where it was leaking from. After 2 hours of work in the scorching California sun, I gave up. The raft is enormous. I reinflated and tried again. Same result. Item returned, and accepted graciously.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Pershing

customer_reviews.title: tough raft
customer_reviews.text: Nice raft, big enough for the whole family and well built. We went thru some rapids and ended up in the brush on the bank and I was sure we were going to get a hole in the raft. I have lost several rafts over the years at that exact spot but this raft held up. The only thing we lost was the makeshift canopy that I built onto it for shade. Hoping to get several years of rafting out of my Rapid Rider.
customer_reviews.author: jason m wudarski

customer_reviews.title: THis item does not hold air!
customer_reviews.text: Inflated item for the 1st time today, July 4th. Before anyone could use it it lost half of the air due to a hole in the seam. This item sucks. The seams are single welded and obviously It is unuaseable. Very sad that a company can't deliver what they promised! Have it one star because the review system make you.
customer_reviews.author: Tony P.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a blast. We recently took in on our vacation to a lake & everyone loved it. It very comfortable fits 4 adults and there's even room for a few kids on there if you want them, lol! We loved the cup holders and it's also very well made, sturdy and thick, don't think it will pop any time soon. Great value for this!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: As good as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this in March and finally blew it up a couple of weeks ago. It is HUGE, but that was expected. Its held up so far, despite rubbing and crashing against our dock multiple times. Its even gotten a little stuck and we had to pull it out from under, and yet still no holes for us. The kids love this!!! And so do we.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader 9876

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We used the tube out on the lake. It was easy to get in and out of. It was durable as people moved about, in and out of it. There was plenty of room for feet, drinks and other warm weather gear (sunscreen, sunglasses). It was perfect of a group to hang together, chat and relax. We only had to blow it up once for a four day weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Test out for leaks before using.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and took it to the salt river, it deflated after and hour almost leaving my family stranded. Luckily, someone on the river had a portable air machine and we used it to inflate it as much as possible. Again, after and hour, it deflated again. We had to detour out of the river to find a road, walked 20 minutes to our car and drove back to get it. The idea of it is wonderful! Unfortunately, we got a leaky one. Returning and will not be purchasing CoolerZ products.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca B.

customer_reviews.title: Just plain awesome.
customer_reviews.text: A rare 5 star from me. This was worth every penny. had a great time relaxing on it. was very impressed with the quality to price ratio. I say buy this if you are on the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Willger

customer_reviews.title: Worst Product Ever Purchased
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandchildern for Christmas. We live in MN so didn't get a chance to try it until we brought it to our cabin for the July 4th week. Would not hold air--never even got it into the water. Grandchildern were very disappointed as was I. Does not seem to be any way to return it or get it replaced. Complete waste of money. Would like to give it "zero stars" but that does not appear to be an option. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relaxation on the water
customer_reviews.text: Would've given it a 5 star review but the first one we got came damaged. We tried to patch the hole with the patch provided but it immediately came off. I returned it with no problems and they sent a new one out quickly so vacation was not ruined and we got to use the new raft which was perfect. Love the built in coolers and cup holders. We were the envy of everyone in the neighborhood. We used the raft in a lagoon in Long Beach Island, NJ so no rapids but was perfect for that afternoon stroll on the water. We also purchased oars which i would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BaileyChoochMom

customer_reviews.title: Great for tubing in Texas!
customer_reviews.text: So make sure the place you’re going tubing allows rafts this size because it is HUGE. But we piled me, my 6’ husband, my mom, and our 3 year old into this thing and it was great! Very well put together and much better than tying 4 tubes together!
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and a great size
customer_reviews.text: The rapid rider 4 was great and I'm really glad I bought it. Had an electric pump to inflate - thankfully because it's pretty big. Two separate coolers worked great for storing things. We had 4 adults lounging around with kids jumping on and off for hours on the river. We anchored up and spent a while out in the sun. Several tubers stopped by to comment on our ride. Very large - very nice!
customer_reviews.author: losing it 2011

customer_reviews.title: It is durable and ever so comfortable. The storage compartments and cup holders make it ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had this floating raft island for two months. It is durable and ever so comfortable. The storage compartments and cup holders make it perfect to enjoy an afternoon on the lake. The hole in the middle makes it perfect to have people slip in and out of the raft without disturbing the other riders. We use a Shop Vac to blow it up and the double cap makes it easy to deflate quickly. We are loving it!
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Probably fine for a lake or pool, don't try on a river
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 3 of these to float on the river. The design was great! Loved the coolers/storage. Unfortunately one deflated halfway down our float. We replaced it with another one and went on another river float. Another deflated. This happened two more times. Apparently they were one use only--we weren't going over any heavy rapids or anything, just light bumping on rocks a few times on a slow river. We've replaced them with Intex single tubes and been much more successful on our river tubing adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Gail J.

customer_reviews.title: Love this tube
customer_reviews.text: Love this tube! Great way to float down the river. The tube held up wonderfully with the exemption with one seat that got a tear in the mesh about halfway through the ride. The seat still held up and is a great product. Filled up quickly and the coolers are nice and deep. Love that there are also little baskets to put other things in and cup holders. Amazing for the price! Would definitely recommend and would buy the same brand again
customer_reviews.author: FeirceAmazonian

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and easy to inflate!
customer_reviews.text: We own one of the really expensive Fiesta Island rafts, but wanted something smaller (and easier to inflate) when we only have a 2-4 people around. This was perfect! Very durable, less than $60, inflated quickly, light weight for transporting, and super comfortable to sit in. Even if it didn’t last the season it didn’t owe me any money, but it’s still going strong! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Used it one time. Air leaks out of the area where you blow it up. And I didn’t get to use it for a couple months after I bought it so I am unable to return it . only used it one time and the air leaked out of it while my family was out on the water not very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: mamaang

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: We used it for the first time last week and it had a hole, we fixed it with the patch attached and today we used it for BBC the second time and I guess it has another hole because it deflate very quick. Not happy with it
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Hah! This thing is a riot. My family gave me the stink eye when I showed up at camp with it and a 30 rack, but before you could shake a stick they were all out floating in it :) this is NOT meant to be towed around by a boat, we towed it very slowly with a small boat just to get it where we wanted and then anchored it, but there is no attach points, no solid handles nothing to tie off to so be advised. all in all, very cool and lots of fun :)
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a negative star available. Bought this for our camping last weekend over at Lake Camanche. Total nightmare! We inflated it for the first time and as we were doing so, we could hear hissing sound coming off from it. Used the patch that it came in with thinking that will resolve the problem. We then went to the water and in less than 4 hours that thing was deflated. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: QT Patootie

customer_reviews.title: Holes holes holes
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Bought it for Christmas gift, they just opened it for summer. Holes in it! Now nowhere on this site to find someone to contact.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy steiger

customer_reviews.title: Not durable/don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE! We got 1 use out of this tube!!! There were multiple holes the next time we went to use, not durable at all!! It was well-cared for between the first tube ride and the next one. Spent several hours patching to use on next tube trip and by the end of that ride was almost completely deflated. The nozzle to inflate is on the underside, not a very good design IMO. Stick with intex brand, muuuucchhh more durable than this cheap crap. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jlbrosius

customer_reviews.title: Had a hole in it out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Everything went fine until we blew it up. One headrest would not stay inflated at all. We noticed that the float was looking a little spongy when we got to the river but assumed it was simply the plastic expanding from it being blown up for the first time. We put more air in it and realized halfway through our trip that we were in fact losing air. It was damage to straight out of the box and will not hold air.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Loses air quickly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the lake house. Opened the package and one of lids to the cooler was ripped off. The air in the raft seems to be leaking out somewhere or just doesn’t hold air as well as it should. I looked around for any holes and couldn’t find any. If you go out and try to float in this. It will lose air within an hour. Just an FYI if you plan of floating for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE AND FUN
customer_reviews.text: Super happy!! its easy to inflate, comfy, and fun. Each sit has a cup holder and their are two coolers,one on each side to put food or drinks.
customer_reviews.author: isa D

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: It’s big. It’s sturdy. Pretty heavy once inflated. Hard for my 10 year old to help carry. But it’s a good float. We’ve used it in the pool, on the river and taking it to the ocean this wknd.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Survived one summer so far. I've had a couple of these and this one is holding out really well. Usually I don't get a year out of them and this one was the first one I did. very comfortable for 4 adults. Kids love it and it last them jumping around on it. I leave it under inflated when the kids are on it.
customer_reviews.author: On the Job

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun
customer_reviews.text: We had a ball in this thing. 4 adults fit fine -- the cooler kept our beers reasonably cold, and the product held up through numerous climb ins and jump ons. It was delivered quickly and easy to inflate. It's great for the lake life!
customer_reviews.author: bon2beez

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold air
customer_reviews.text: I bought this almost 6 months ago in anticipation of our summer lake trip. Well here we are and the thing is deflated every day, so we either forget about it or re-inflate it every day. Very disappointed, not worth the money, and now return window is gone. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Good for groups
customer_reviews.text: One of the best floats I’ve purchased for a group. The coolers keep stuff cool and have a latch for closure. It comes with rope to tie other floats together. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Its really big!
customer_reviews.text: Massive! Fun! This thing is huge, and very nice. Used it at a quarry, just floating around, drink holders and coolers are nice touch for that. Took a while to inflate, as its massive, but the fill valve is easy to use, and letting air out is easy as well. Well made, no issues at all. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Crash kelley

customer_reviews.title: NOT puncture resistant!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item as a gift. Within 2 hours of use, it was deflated. On the box, it is described as having Inflata-Shield, a puncture resistant material. There was no patching material included so the item couldn't be repaired. A very expensive and embarrassing gift. DO NOT BUY this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin C Meade

customer_reviews.title: Hole first time using it
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big. It got a hole in the lining first time we used it! And very hard to patch we went down a river nothing crazy
customer_reviews.author: TraciHesse

customer_reviews.title: Lacks quality
customer_reviews.text: The material the raft is made from lacked quality. We found out the hard way when as floated down a river, we heard and saw air bubbles seeping from the raft. There was a small hole in the bottom of the raft allowing the leak. We safely made it to shore deeply disappointed but safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not safe for children and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This raft was cheaply made. Blew up one time and the seams split not to mention there is a swim whole without a net directly in the middle which was unsafe for kids because they would swim under the raft looking for the hole and get discombobulated because there are 4 other wholes with netting. Possible downing could happened Not safe for small kids
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: Sooo much fun!! I highly recommend, don’t forget paddles and a way to get back in the raft.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it going down rivers
customer_reviews.text: Used twice and now I have to use 3 patches just to inflate the tube. Description says "high grade PVC vynl" which doesn't seem to hold up to much.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Fun and reasonably durable
customer_reviews.text: This raft lasted through a rough couple weeks on a lake with some rowdy fellas. Looking forward to the next Summer!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: great for the price. exactly what I wanted and more! definitely suggest having a pump to fill it with air... it's huge lol
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Group float
customer_reviews.text: used only once but it seem to be sturdy. We use at the lake to relax and in a beverage or two on it. Easy to fold up as well. Look forward to using it more.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Flat in Hours
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for a trip to the lake. I didn't take it out of the box until we got to the lake where I inflated it on the dock and put it in the water! It was flat in hours. Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Dane R Bozman

customer_reviews.title: for sitting in the water
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this if you just want to sit on a pool or even go out to swim but you definitely need to consider getting your own or if you’re going to take it anywhere if you tie it to something I’m afraid the plastic might tear so I won’t tie it to a doc
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price
customer_reviews.text: Inflated quickly with electric inflator. Looks great! Nephew pulled us with a paddle boat and all went well. Fairly comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. F.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE party float for all summer water activities! All of my friends love when I bring this along and it has definitely changed how we party on rivers and lakes. If you have the right air pump it doesn't take any time at all to fill up. I LOVE the cup holders and built in coolers. Amazing float.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Would like to know if I would be able to exchange ...
customer_reviews.text: Brought it to the lake this weekend but when we tried to pump air in to it realized that one of the sections had a hole in it. Would like to know if I would be able to exchange this one that does not inflate for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Great float for 4!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a fun buy! Used it for a 3 hr float and it was great! Only thing I didn't like was when my 11 year old son decided he wanted to get and and swim, it left the float a little unbalanced...meaning his side lifted a little without his weight. It was nice being able to float with the 4 person float. No need to connect tubes!
customer_reviews.author: TandMGillespie

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great float for the price. We use ours at the Lake and it has been a hit with the kids. Will definitely buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great float, nice and sturdy. Roomy enough for many drinks!
customer_reviews.text: Great price great tube! So much fun! Worth it even if it only lasts one season which it doesnt look so since it is hardy at least for adult lounging which is what we are using it for!
customer_reviews.author: TinySnacks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for 3-4 people with room for your stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Used this tube down a river which was somewhat low. Floated through nice, no rips or tears at the end!
customer_reviews.author: patty0620

customer_reviews.title: Hole/Leak in product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in February and just got to use it for the first time in May and the product had a leak in it right out of box. Didn't hold air.
customer_reviews.author: Tish A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: My favorite floaty Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing with all my heart!! My Mother’s Day present that ALL the kids jump on!
customer_reviews.author: momof4

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this last week. It came very quickly which was a positive! Inflated it on day of arrival to check it out and within hours lost air. Thought perhaps we hadn’t secured the plugs so refilled prior to taking it on the water this weekend and within a short time again lost air!! So it went back in the boat and we resorted to laying on the shore. Plan to return this week and look for a better made product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy B.

customer_reviews.title: I usually don't give bad reviews but this product I felt deserved one
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't give bad reviews but this product I felt deserved one, it looks really cool and it is but after 15 mins on the water it quickly loses air. Goes flat and I thought the first time I just didn't properly inflate it but the second time we took it out I made sure I filled it up and sure enough it leaked air, I'm not saying it has a hole I checked. Air escapes. Disappointed Amazon, I paid $70 for a poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: If that’s out of the norm then I would 100% recommend. I was able to get an easy refund ...
customer_reviews.text: 3/5 stars. I was so excited for this and it was exactly what I wanted expected... unfortunately there was a beyond impossible hole to find and if deflated quickly, 1-2 hours before I could use. I may have just been unlucky. If that’s out of the norm then I would 100% recommend. I was able to get an easy refund and hope I was an unlucky one with the hole situation.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Great tube!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great tube that the whole family can enjoy! It inflated fairly quickly and folds pretty small when it’s deflated making it ideal to bring out on the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Springsteen

customer_reviews.title: Sank like the Titantic
customer_reviews.text: Went through the San Juan rapids in Sacramento California once last year and this raft was a total loss halfway down. only reason it gets two stars is because even though it was popped it held enough air to get me swimming distance from our stopping point about 2 miles downstream
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Hoping to reach Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we needed, but it did not hold air for more than 15 minutes with just two people in it. I'd like to try to fix it, or get a replacement- but I can't get it to fit back in the box to ship it back. I'm afraid if I could find the leak, a patch might not last long either. We were lucky that we were close to shore when this started to deflate.
customer_reviews.author: k guinasso

customer_reviews.title: The most used lake toy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a HUGE hit at our family get together - everyone wanted to be on it and it held up well. I can't say how many summers it will last, but the cup holders and seats are great. Some wanted to float all day in it. We have not tried towing this - just floating.
customer_reviews.author: MEM6407

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best quality float and the cup holders are very sturdy. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pickle Lady

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Float
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! Our family of 4 with two young adult sons had a great time on this! We lounged, had drinks using the two coolers and floated comfortably in the lake!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Legreid

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price....
customer_reviews.text: Nice item, but cup holders are placed at stupid locations. Built in coolers are useless and will not look or work like the photos you see.The little rope that goes around is kind of a joke. However for the price it is very comfortable and seems to be made of strong material. My wife likes it, and that's what counts!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: we love floating our local river
customer_reviews.text: we love floating our local river. We owned one of these before and named it Bertha. Now this is Bertha 2!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Only had it one season so will see. For the first season it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable and Great Design
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a lake vacation and it was perfect. Very durable and sturdy. Love the built in coolers so you can keep future drinks cold, very convenient. The nets at bottom of the seats are great to keep you cool while you float.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor McGraw

customer_reviews.title: No issues here
customer_reviews.text: Completed my first rafting experience with this, made it without a leak
customer_reviews.author: Holly Citti

customer_reviews.title: So FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect for what we wanted. Did have a tiny hole but thankfully it was right next to the valve so caught it right away.
customer_reviews.author: MICHIVER

customer_reviews.title: Awesome find
customer_reviews.text: I give high marks for this product. I would consider this a diamond in the rough. Thank you for making such a superior product
customer_reviews.author: Mickster9789

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: This is well priced for the value. It seats four people with coolers and drink holders. I actually use this in my pool for parties. It is well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Leonard

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome, and it's half the price of most similar ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, and it's half the price of most similar rafts. We had one of the pillows get a hole in it by hitting a sharp spot on the dock, but it was easily repaired. Perhaps the more expensive versions are a bit thicker plastic, but we love this. Super comfy, not too hard to get in and our of, and you stay just the right amount wet.
customer_reviews.author: Picky in DC

customer_reviews.title: Came in next day
customer_reviews.text: Liked ability I had 3 yr old twins that I could keep up on while floating the river. They would hope from one to the other. The containers got water in them and didn't hold cokes in holder. But got us safely down the river over small rapids and falls and over rocks and didn't loose air.
customer_reviews.author: sharon r.

customer_reviews.title: Seams fail.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have owned. The first one lasted 5 days and the seams failed. It was fun so we gave it a second chance. The second one never made it into the lake having a 1 inch hole at a seam. Unable to return for credit as it was outside vendors policy. Would not recommend to anyone and will not give Intex or vendor a third chance.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Riganati

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Floaties for Party
customer_reviews.text: Lots of rave review on this floatie. Having a cooler and cup holder is the BEST! It does take 20 minutes inflate and another 20 minutesto deflate.
customer_reviews.author: Annette FS

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This float ripped in an area unfixable after only 2 uses. Kinda waste of my 70 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Used once on a 5 hour rafting trip. So far so good! Wish the coolers were removable and stayed colder, but good value for $55
customer_reviews.author: Phoebecole25

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold air
customer_reviews.text: Well it was great while it lasted. This thing stays inflated for maybe 5 hours. Then noticeably starts losing air. I expected a lot better for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Bahn

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Inflated this right out of the box brand new. A large hole appeared at the seam within 5 minutes. Can't be repaired and is now completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rice

customer_reviews.title: What a great float!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this float!!! It was comfortable to float around the lake in, easy access to food and drinks, lots of fun had!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Casey

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun and relaxation
customer_reviews.text: This fun float made our girls weekend at the cabin phenomenal! Great cooler slots. Very comfortable. Easier to get in and out of than you think. Feels pretty hearty. VERY comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Miner

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: This float is huge!!!!! It fit all of us comfortable and has 2 coolers for drinks or food. I did get a hole in it fairly quick but I was able to patch it
customer_reviews.author: MIR

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: So impressed!!! I purchased the 4 seater float for the 4th of July and I was nervous it wouldn’t hold up. It held up for 4 consecutive days in the water (we deflated and took it out the water after vacation) and one day, there were 6 adults on it 😱 2 of those being large men!! Awesome product and so impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great floaty. Not cheap. Durable and easily fit four people
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Dantinne

product_meta.title: Bestway CoolerZ Rapid Rider Quad Inflatable Raft | Pool Float Includes 4 Cupholders, 2 Built-In Coolers, 2 Storage Buckets | Lounge Seatsup To 4 People | Great For Adults & Kids
product_meta.description: The Bestway rapid rider quad inflatable floating Island is an excellent choice for floating in a river or lake with friends. Constructed using durable, high-gauge PVC material, The rapid rider quad comfortably seats four people and features built-in backrests for additional support, a cool mesh bottom and 4 cup holders. The all-around grab rope makes it easy to mount from the water. It also includes two built-in coolers allowing you to take along Frosty beverages and small snacks. Perfect for memorable summertime fun.
feature_bullets: Perfect party float: This large floating raft is the ideal solution for ultimate summer fun for adults and kids. It can comfortably fit up to 4 people with extra wide pillow backrests and built-in cup holders for each person.

Stay cool on the water: dip your feet and legs in the water to cool off in the open floor area in the middle of the float. Each seat Has pliable mesh bottoms, so you sit below the waterline for a refreshing feel.

Keep your ice cold beverage close: 4 cup holders are strategically placed around the float, so everyone is always at arm's reach of their favorite drink. Stash beverages and ice in the 2 convenient built-in cooler bag, so you don't have to come off the water to replenish drinks.

Fun all summer long: Made from puncture-resistant Fortech and in flat a shield Material to enhance durability and flexibility, This pool float can handle all water settings, like the pool, beach, lake, or River. When deflated, fold it up compactly for easy storage and transportation. A heavy-duty repair patch comes with for accidental rips or tears.
Connect to other tubes: 4 grab ropes with built-in grommets can be used to connect yourself to other pool floats, anchors, boats, or Docks.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars623 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
